alert.note: Alert for Baker County; Harney County; Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 27 at 2:53AM PDT until March 28 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT MDT /11 PM PDT/ TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT MDT /11 PM PDT/ TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches in the valleys and 6 to 12 inches over the mountains, except lower amounts south of Burns to Juntura and in the Baker Valley. Areas of blowing and drifting snow with winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Harney County, Baker County and Malheur County zones. * WHEN...From midnight MDT /11 PM PDT/ tonight to midnight MDT /11 PM PDT/ Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow may mix with rain below 4000 feet MSL Tuesday afternoon before changing back to snow Tuesday evening behind a cold front.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Baker County; Harney County; Malheur County
